definition: (of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: In the first section are the improvement measures to the legislation of community-based correction.
sentences.chinese: 第一節，我國社區矯正類型的立法完善。

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律損失。

sentences.english: The tertiary stratigraphic sequences in the area are consummated.
sentences.chinese: 完善了本區第三系地層層序。

sentences.english: The company has advanced technology equipment and pipe sound detection equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有先進的制管工藝設備和完善的檢測設備。

sentences.english: ASAS/Tysol, Inc. has a complete line of products focused on leak detection.
sentences.chinese: 股份有限公司，在滲漏檢測方面有一套完善的生產線。

sentences.english: The successful development of private colleges depends on its good ope rational mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 民辦高校的順利發展有賴於自身運行機制的完善。

sentences.english: Standards for drinking water have been improved continuously.
sentences.chinese: 飲用水水質標準不斷進行完善。

sentences.english: But some of parts of the system can be improved and ameliorated .
sentences.chinese: 但該系統還有許多地方需要完善和改進。

sentences.english: It is the perfection and the supreme adornment of the justified soul.
sentences.chinese: 這是完善和最高人民法院裝飾品的理由靈魂。

sentences.english: According to the actual production status, the assemble welding process has been gradually improved and perfected.
sentences.chinese: 根據生產情況，不斷改進和完善裝焊工藝方案。

sentences.english: Finally some suggestions were proposed to perfect tourist interpretation of Cuihuashan National Geopark.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了翠華山景區旅遊解說完善的建議。

sentences.english: Conclusion Network reporting system in Quzhou City is gradually improving and operating well overall.
sentences.chinese: 結論衢州市網絡直報工作逐步完善，總體運行良好。

sentences.english: So he taught me how to improve my skills.
sentences.chinese: 於是他教我如何完善我的技巧。

sentences.english: The first is the inadequacy of disaster-response mechanisms, and the poor co-ordination between the various government departments involved.
sentences.chinese: 首先，應災機制不完善，有關各級政府部門不協調。

sentences.english: They strive for perfection and will expect the same from you.
sentences.chinese: 他們可是追求完善的門客。

sentences.english: A new and excellent strategy for the assault on France was at last hammered out.
sentences.chinese: 一個襲擊法國的完善的新戰略方案終於出籠了。

definition: faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
